info.description: This is a sample server celler server.
info.title: Swagger Example API

post.description: Authenticates a user using email or username and password.
Register a new user with username, email, and password
Creates a new category and returns the created category

delete.description: Deletes multiple categories by their IDs

post.description: Creates a new collection and returns the created collection

delete.description: Deletes multiple collections by their IDs

get.description: Returns a list of hero collections
Returns a list of home collections

post.description: Creates a new customer and returns the created customer

delete.description: Deletes multiple customer by their IDs

post.description: Creates a new file and returns the created file

delete.description: Deletes multiple files by their IDs

post.description: Creates a new menu and returns the created menu

delete.description: Deletes multiple menu by their IDs

post.description: Creates a new order and returns the created order

delete.description: Deletes multiple orders by their IDs

post.description: Creates a new page and returns the created page

delete.description: Deletes multiple page by their IDs

post.description: Creates a new post and returns the created post

delete.description: Deletes multiple post by their IDs

post.description: Creates a new product and returns the created product

delete.description: Deletes multiple products by their IDs

post.description: Creates a new review with optional image and returns the created review

delete.description: Deletes multiple reviews by their IDs

get.description: Returns a list of reviews for a product, with optional filters

parameters.description: Filter by whether review has image (true/false)
parameters.name: has_image

get.description: Returns the average rating and total number of reviews for a specific product
get.summary: Get average rating of a product

post.description: Creates a new user and returns the created user

delete.description: Deletes multiple users by their IDs
